description: Enjoy these cheesy stuffed potatoes on their own or as a side dish.
name: Cheesy Stuffed Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place under a hot grill until the cheese melts and is golden brown. If the potatoes are being made some time ahead before you want to eat them, cook them in the oven so that they heat through and are golden on top.
